description:
Hotaru is a firefly youkai who in the past had a profound friendship with http://anidb.net/ch34346 [Akifumi], a human that she was in love with. When he was younger, Akifumi could see see her, but lost the ability when he got older. This saddened her deeply.
Source: Natsume Yuujinchou Wiki, edited.
name: Hotaru
